name: GlobsWithGuns
description:
Two young globs find themselves in an abandoned corridors crawling with mutant red blobs. Strapped with a gun, the globs must fight their way out or die trying. 

Use WASD or arrow keys to move

Mouse to aim and shoot

Escape to access pause menu 

Your controls over which glob you are swap back and forth

Push blocks into holes in the ground

Shoot red blobs

Unity engine

All assets made in blender

Sounds using sfxr and beep box
